short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Amazon product reviews and download to Excel/CSV with one click. Export comments, ratings, images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Reviews Exporter | Images & Videos, auto scrape, extract and download reviews from Amazon product listings, including images and videos, and you can one click to export to xlsx/csv file.

For perfect use, it is recommended to set the Amazon language to English.

# Update: 09/2024
Amazon has made changes to the display of reviews. Currently, product pages will show a maximum of 50 reviews. If you wish to view more, you will need to utilize the search and filtering functionality for further refinement.

# Features
âœ“ Download reviews from Amazon product listing to Excel/CSV/Shopify CSV
âœ“ Export as XLSX (Excel Document) include all 'Read reviews that mention'
âœ“ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify Reviews import format
(https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/import-export-reviews)
âœ“ Download reviews images and videos
âœ“ Filter by keywords
âœ“ Filter by stars rating
âœ“ All reviews filters
âœ“ Optimize the extraction of review helpful number, date, and location for USA, UK sites.

# It's free?
Yes, Amazon Reviews Exporter is free. You can get basic functionality and upgrade to get more functionality.

# FAQ
If you want to export reviews include 'Read reviews that mention',
you need to scroll to position in the product listing currently.

When opening the product listing page, if there is no data when exporting reviews, it may be that the content script has not been successfully injected yet. You can wait a while and try again.

https://amazonreviews.inforld.com/#faq
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us at support@inforld.com

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.
